I/O Variable Engine Properties

Property Description
Current Faults Returns a list of the active faults on the variable engine that you wire to the reference input. Use this property in code that is not time critical. To return a list of active faults from time critical code, use the Get Fault List (Time Critical) method.�Details
Fault Configuration Displays the fault configuration of the variable engine that you wire to the reference input.�Details
IO Forcing Enabled Enables or disables forcing on the variable engine that you wire to the reference input.�Details
IO Scan Mode Sets the NI Scan Engine mode on the variable engine that you wire to the reference input.�Details
IO Scan Period Sets the scan period of the NI Scan Engine on the variable engine that you wire to the reference input.�Details
